name: Abyssal Vertex
description:
Abyssal Vertex  - build 2 ( hotfix live )

This game was made for the GGJ2022 Game Jam. This is a active development build as I flesh it out over the next few months.  I am using this game as my personal learning tool, builds for Abyssal Vertex will always be free

All the music  in the game  is currently by ANDROIID 
https://soundcloud.com/tylerj98 

      

New build goes up at least once per week as I learn new things and expand the project
